blogs.title: Robotic Arm Catches Whatever You Throw It

blogs.title: Watch This Robot Arm Play Catch

blogs.title: Researchers teach robotic arm to catch
blogs.summary: Researchers at the École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) in Switzerland have developed a robotic arm capable of processing and catching moving objects in just a fraction of a second. The team, that works at the institute&rsqu

author.name: Gizmag Emerging Technology Magazine

blogs.title: Scientists build a robot arm that catches objects in the blink of an eye
blogs.summary: Humans are good at catching fast-moving objects -- just ask any baseball fan. Robots typically lag behind, however, which is why the École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) has developed a robot arm with the reaction time need

blogs.title: This Robotic Catching Arm Can React In Less Than 500ths Of A Second
blogs.summary: Developed by EPFL researchers, this robot is capable of reacting on the fly and grasping objects with complex shapes and trajectories. Incredibly, it's equipped with a learning algorithm that allows it to be taught by humans. Read more...

blogs.title: Brazo robótico ultraveloz capaz de coger objetos en pleno vuelo
blogs.summary: Un nuevo robot es capaz de reaccionar con notable inmediatez y agarrar objetos con formas y trayectorias complejas en menos de 5 centésimas de segundo. En bastantes de estos casos, a un humano le sería difícil lograrlo.Es fascinante ve
